content:
Sub05 has been forced to modify her body to better satisfy Dom's twisted desires. She has undergone numerous surgeries and procedures to alter her appearance, resulting in a body that is both exotic and disturbing.

Her long blonde hair has been dyed a deep, rich red and styled in elaborate curls that cascade down her shoulders. Her porcelain skin has been stretched tight over her slender frame, giving her an unnaturally youthful and smooth appearance. Her eyes have been enlarged and enhanced with artificial color, making them seem almost otherworldly in their beauty.

Her body has been reshaped and contoured to fit Dom's specifications, with her breasts enlarged to impossible proportions and her hips widened to give her a more exaggerated hourglass figure. She has been tattooed and pierced in numerous places, with intricate designs and gemstones adorning her skin.

Despite the modifications to her body, Sub05 remains a beautiful and alluring figure. However, the extent of her modifications reveals the depth of her brainwashing and the twisted control that Dom holds over her.
